channel.title: I need help badly! if you can solve this, you are a java master!
channel.description:
Java Plug-in 1.6.0_20 Using JRE version 1.6.0_20-b02 Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM User home directory = C:\Users\owner ---------------------------------------------------- c: clear console window f: finalize objects on finalization queue g: garbage collect h: display this help message l: dump classloader list m: print memory usage o: trigger logging q: hide console r: reload policy configuration s: dump system and deployment properties t: dump thread list v: dump thread stack x: clear classloader cache 0-5: set trace level to <n> ----------------------------------------------------
java.lang.SecurityException: trusted loader attempted to load sandboxed resource from website name covered at com.sun.deploy.security.CPCallbackHandler$ParentCallback.check(Unknown Source) at com.sun.deploy.security.CPCallbackHandler$ParentCallback.access$1400(Unknown Source) at com.sun.deploy.security.CPCallbackHandler$ChildElement.checkResource(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.checkResource(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Exception: java.lang.SecurityException: trusted loader attempted to load sandboxed resource from website name covered java.lang.SecurityException: trusted loader attempted to load sandboxed resource from website name covered at com.sun.deploy.security.CPCallbackHandler$ParentCallback.check(Unknown Source) at com.sun.deploy.security.CPCallbackHandler$ParentCallback.access$1400(Unknown Source) at com.sun.deploy.security.CPCallbackHandler$ChildElement.checkResource(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.checkResource(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Exception: java.lang.SecurityException: trusted loader attempted to load sandboxed resource from website name covered
this is different from my other error, whats wrong and how can i fix it?!?!?!?:?!?!?!?!?!?!

item.title: I need help badly! if you can solve this, you are a java master!
item.dc:creator: @ipwnzall3 ipwnzall3
item.description:
@ipwnzall3 wrote:

deathschaos9:

If you have teamviewer I’ll be happy to take a look and see if I can fix it.

sure, ill download teamviewer

item.title: I need help badly! if you can solve this, you are a java master!
item.dc:creator: @ipwnzall3 ipwnzall3
item.description:
@ipwnzall3 wrote:

conner_:

How could he explain it any better? Don’t be a jerk. It is trying to load an unsigned JAR file, which you cannot do. You must sign it before using it.

but i did sign it! here, ill try again

java.lang.SecurityException: trusted loader attempted to load sandboxed resource from website name blocked
at com.sun.deploy.security.CPCallbackHandler$ParentCallback.check(Unknown Source)
at com.sun.deploy.security.CPCallbackHandler$ParentCallback.access$1400(Unknown Source)
at com.sun.deploy.security.CPCallbackHandler$ChildElement.checkResource(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.checkResource(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Exception: java.lang.SecurityException: trusted loader attempted to load sandboxed resource from website name blocked

this error is smaller than the last one, what happened now? i signed the jar in jar maker… ill try AGAIN
DOESNT WORK! MAN WHATS WRONG WITH THESE ERRORS?! i swear, if someone can actually help me fix them, i will never post on this community again.ever.

Read full topic
